glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.para: This is the glossary for the Wolframe Application Building Manual. It covers most of the terms used in a Wolframe application, although some of the terms might be found only in the SDK manual.

glossdef.para: Some reasonable definition here. BTW, this just an example.
